actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the nonrecognition of gain on the sale of a principal residence if the taxpayer is unemployed.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make certain individuals eligible for the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence during a period of unemployment. Reduces the amount of the maximum exclusion for such individuals.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the nonrecognition of gain on the sale of a principal residence if the taxpayer is unemployed.
